name: Chain Reaction (itch) (Tororoxu)
description:
Entry for Thinky Games are for Everyone game jam. How  a shoot'em'up can be converted into a thinky game?

Avoid enemy waves in a damaged ship that only can fire its weapon once.

This is a small prototype for this idea with only two levels. I didn't have the time to include all the mechanics and visuals I'd wanted to.

Controls:

  • Arrows for movement
  • X to fire

Special credits to:

  • @artero for giving important feedback and motivation to finish this project!
  • RobbyDuguay for music with hisNine Songs in Pico-8!
